name: Swift Feather
description: This feather enhances your agility, allowing you to move with incredible speed for a short duration.

name: Elixir of Shadows
description: Grants temporary invisibility, making you unseen by enemies for a brief period.

name: Arcane Amulet
description: Harness the power of arcane energy to temporarily boost your spellcasting abilities, increasing damage output.

name: Crystal Shard
description: A throwable shard that shatters on impact, dealing damage to enemies in a small radius.

name: Vampiric Dagger
description: Each successful strike with this dagger grants you a portion of health, stealing life from your foes.

name: Thunderstruck Boots
description: Unleash a shockwave around you, stunning nearby enemies when activated.

name: Potion of Fortune
description: Consume to significantly increase your chances of finding rare items for a limited time.

name: Phoenix Feather
description: Upon death, the feather revives you with a portion of health, giving you a second chance.

name: Molten Shield
description: Temporarily envelops you in a fiery shield, reflecting a portion of damage back to attackers.

name: Mirror Cloak
description: Reflects projectiles back at enemies for a short duration, providing a temporary shield against ranged attacks.

name: Enchanted Map
description: Reveals the layout of the entire floor, including the location of hidden rooms and treasures.

name: Cursed Skull
description: Embrace the curse to gain increased power for a short time, but beware the consequences.

name: Celestial Orb
description: Summons a temporary celestial ally to aid you in battle, attacking enemies and providing support.

name: Frostbite Rune
description: Imbue your attacks with icy energy, slowing and chilling enemies with each strike.

name: Time Warp Hourglass
description: Manipulate time, allowing you to rewind a short duration to undo mistakes or escape perilous situations.
